channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:52 Air alarm in Zaporizhzhia and Zaporizhzhya Territorial Community to Further Messages.

item.title: 游리 05:43 Drawing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community

Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Mirovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk.
